Unhealthy gut can affect your mental health
At times our body does not feel well, and we can't even figure out the reason behind it. Did you ever think that poor gut health could play a pivotal role… [+2059 chars]

articles.description: Background Population-based serological studies allow to estimate prevalence of SARS-CoV-2 infections despite a substantial number of mild or asymptomatic disease courses. This became even more relevant for decision making after vaccination started. The KoCo1…
